root.str: Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Oops! You spawned at the start of the tutorial instead of the facility!It's OK, just step into this teleporter to quickly get back to the other spawn room.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Allows the use of pistols while cloaked. Firing pistols while cloaked increases visibility dramatically.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Flash Hood Ornament.
Decreases the stationary fall rate of the Mosquito by 8 KPH.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Sunderer. VS use only.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Leaf camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Control consoles are captured by standing near them. Once the majority of a facility's control consoles are owned by an attacking empire, ownership of that facility will start being contested.
Allows cortium to be used to create an Anti-Aircraft Phalanx turret that may be manned by allied players. VS only.
Sticky Grenades attach themselves to most surfaces when thrown.

Unlocks the Shield Matrix Pylon ability for the Engineer. NC only.

Allies within 6m of the pylon have their maximum shield health increased by 50.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 grenades.
Out With a Bang Vehicle Decal
Increases the Idle Timer on the Sunderer to 21 minutes.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
The only thing better than a robotic killing machine is a giant robotic killing machine. VS use only.
Customize your Flash with the Rail Guard. VS use only.
You can deploy directly into a Galaxy, Valkyrie, or Sunderer owned and operated by one of your squad members.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 645 rounds.

Increases the Bombardment Shield's base damage resistance of 50% to 59%

The Bombardment Shield is created when deploying into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> This is the Reliquary. A fancy word that means a place to store weird stuff. Apparently, whatever they keep here is valuable, so they put up extra barriers to keep their artifacts safe.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
You can now wield the soundtrack of failure. Apply liberally to showcase the shortcomings of your enemies. NSO use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 shells.
Items purchased with [*CurrencyName*] can only be equipped by this character.
Apply the single use Indar Canyons v2 camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
While cloaked, increase sprint speed by 15% but damage taken is increased by 90%.
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 22 seconds.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> So, remain vigilant for the fallen human operatives. Note their position and collect their dog tags. A commission is received for each recovery. And we owe it to them to remember their names.
NC - Pistol - Mid - V9 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Get in and man the gun!
No implants can currently be slotted for construction.
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 42 rounds.
Nanite Systems launched the NiSGO gun optic much to the delight of designated marksmen across Auraxis. The NiSGO utilizes a triple chevron reticule with 3.4x magnification.
Additional thrusters allow the Mosquito to directly ascend and descend quicker.
You have chosen an invalid name. Please choose a non-profane name with no spaces or special characters.
Apply the Abstract Circle camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">MISSION</font> Use Terminal To Spawn Flash
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Adds hubcaps to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
This rack of dumbfired Havoc Rockets launch in a barrage of four, inflicting a destabilizing field on impacted mechanical targets that prevent them from being repaired for a time. TR use only.
Adds cosmetic plating to the cockpit area. VS use only.
Premium Cortium Module Description; This item will be granted to all players but only availble to place with buythrough (DBC, not cortium)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 113 rounds.
Allows the magazine's overcharged shots to pierce up to one infantry target, however, the Charger now fires 10% slower at all times.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Vanguard by 10%.

The Condensate Grenade detonates into an icy explosion that slows the movement, reload speed, and rate of fire of infantry and MAX units by 20% for up to 6 seconds. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.

3 second fuse.
In the light of Vanu's wisdom, we've concluded you're overdue for an upgrade to that standard issue armor! Act now for a deep discount on a variety of composite helmets and armors!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Increases the amount of nanites gained by 50%.

A festive blue cap featuring the New Conglomerate's logo.
(No XP Boost)

This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
Allows soldiers to carry 4 additional magazines for both their primary and sidearm weapons.
Improves the top speed and acceleration of the Flash.
Improves thruster efficiency, increasing total air time by 15 seconds.
[*player*] has invited you to join their squad.
Member Discount Applied - Members always save 10%
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this decal. Designed by 88Eden.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 12.5%
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Adequate performance, operative. I have been informated that your reward has been delivered.
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Contains a LA1 Anchor plus 1000 Certs
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 90.
Further improve the Vanguard's rotation speed, reverse speed and braking power.

For marksmen that prefer to not put themselves directly in the fray, the Nanite Systems Quadra scope allows users distance between themselves and their intended targets. The Quadra comes equipped with a simple crosshair at 4x magnification.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Grassland Camo
Lightweight plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Increases the power of the deployment shield by 80%.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Collect the researcher's datapad and bring it back to the flotilla. We can't let it fall into enemy hands.
Apply the Mongo Spots camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Further increases the range of the IFF Device
Well done. The outpost is secure.
Increases the MAXes fire rate for a short period of time
The anti-tank AF-22 Crow's powerful warhead and lock-on capabilities have proved the weapon as an effective solution to enemy armor.
A Citadel Shield has been deployed
Adds flaming trails to the vehicle's wheels. TR use only.
Your deployable was despawned because it was in a no-deploy zone.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Inertial Dampener 4
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Sun Hood Ornament.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.36 seconds.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Apply the Comic Book camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Cloaked Infiltrators are most visible while sprinting, and least visible while crouching and stationary.
Improves the vehicle's maximum forward speed and acceleration.
Unlocks access to Concussion Grenades. Combat Medic only.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Harasser. VS use only.
<font color="#7FF4FF">CHAT COMMANDS</font> - The portion in brackets is the fewest characters you can type to active the command. </font>
Interact with the warp terminal marked by your waypoint.
A set of cosmetic armor plates and accents suitable for seasoned Light Assault soldiers.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Chrome Viper Fins. All factions can use this gear.
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. VS use only.
Single Use Indar Plateau Armor Camo
The Gemini VX62's burst fire mode allows for accurate fire past the range of typical assault rifles.
Adds this customization to your vehicle. Usable by all factions.
Used to purchase implants or unlock weapons
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 280 rounds.
Hotspots on the map indicate where combat is occuring.
Adds 1 round to the default magazine size.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Kill enemies while wearing a Halloween mask.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Flash ATV's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
(NC)(Flash) Reduces Damage taken from mines by 50% and other attacks from the bottom of the vehicle by 25%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 160 rounds.
Outfit Loyalty is earned by capturing and defending bases with your outfitmates.
The medium-range SAS-R's sniper rifle features a rapid bolt action that allows users to make follow up shots on targets before they can reach cover. NC use only.
Increases the yaw rate of the Galaxy by 2 degrees/second.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Soldier, I assume you've read the mission posting so I'll get straight to the point. If our techs are correct this could be our chance to get a real leg up in this war; to get started, warp to Esamir and then head to the marked Containment Site. I'll contact you once you've arrived.
Apply the Lightning Strike camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> I'd do it myself, but I'm an indoor cat. You know what I'm saying? Just decloak the crate once you get out there and follow the step-by-step instructions. Easy nanites!
Increases the Idle Timer on the Mosquito to 18 minutes.
Hack this door lock to disable a nearby door

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Reduces camera shake from explosions by 35%, and flinch when struck by 60%.
Apply the Roller Chain camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Collect the researcher's datapad and bring it back to the flotilla. We can't let it fall into enemy hands.
<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> Auraximas is a season of giving, please allow others to obtain their gifts. Check again tomorrow.
Apply the Ortho Digital camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Single Use Jungle Forest Armor Camo
Learn about the Vanu Sovereignty's pursuit of technology.
This special edition of the E540 Halberd mirrors its predecessor's effectiveness, while using a high-density plasma payload. All factions can use this weapon.
This facility now belongs to the NC!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 grenades.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 630 rounds.
Apply the Stone Cold camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Awarded for mastery of the Valkyrie, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is a tribute to its owner's dedication to the aircraft.
Activate to disrupt lock-on attempts and missiles tracking the vehicle for 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 27 seconds.
Thank you for buying a membership and supporting the development of PlanetSide 2!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 19 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Use a shotgun to kill enemy players.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> This is the Reliquary. Additional security has been required to maintain the safety of the artifacts. And the researchers.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Forest v2 Armor Camo
Apply the single use Digital camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
This customization adds a Tiger Face decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.

Activate to repair 10% of the vehicle over 5 seconds. Also prevents the vehicle from overheating when firing during that time. If the vehicle is on fire or overheating when activated, it will also immediately remove those effects. Can be activated once every 47 seconds.

Overheating occurs when firing the primary weapon while deployed into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.
Contains the following Platinum weapons for all factions: the NS-357P Underboss, the NS-15MP, and the NS-11CP.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 11.25%
The Charger carbine integrates an overcharging system and unique magazine that increases the stopping power of the first few shots upon freshly reloading the weapon. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Capture and hold the most Large Outposts
Spawn Harasser from the nearby marked terminal
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Purple Sparkler Hood Ornament. VS use only.
Kill 35 players while airborne from a bounce pad

Shattered and Broken

There were warning signs. We rely so much on this technology, and yet understand so little. An inconsistency here, an outage there, the occasional soldier lost forever in the data.
We overlooked it all because we had no choice... Did we have a choice? I still haven't heard back from the 50 who were there at the time of collapse. They could be gone, too. Lost forever in the data.
Forever in the data.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 6 KPH.
Player stats such as kills and deaths are not tracked while in VR Training.
Adds the Chrome Shatterguard Windshield to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.

The ACU syncs the underbarrel to the class equipping the weapon. This attachment can be active alongside other attachment types.

Infiltrator: EMP - Destroys deployables and scrambles HUD.
Light Assault: Impulse - Knocks back enemies and the wielder.
Medic: Cleanse - Heals and clears some status effects.
Engineer: Enhancement - Repairs and increases the maximum health of mechanical targets.
Heavy Assault: Havoc - Prevents mechanical targets from being repaired.
Apply the single use Temperate Chaparral camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
A high density particle field that helps protect the user from injury. The shield will regenerate over time if not receiving damage.
Adds 4 grenades to the default magazine size.

<font color="#00FFAA">Narrator Drone:</font> FL-34, the infamous agent of the Black Market, has been working feverishly on a potentially lucrative business arrangement and would welcome business partners. He can be found near the Atrium on Sanctuary.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 550 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 shells.

Failed to kick player from the platoon due to bad kicker id.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360 rounds.
Adds 4 grenades to the default magazine size.

You have entered unhealthy gaming time. For your own health, please get offline immediately. If you continue playing, your health will be harmed and your in-game gains will be reduced to 0. Your in-game gain will not become normal until you accumulate 5 hours of offline time.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 5%
Earn resupply experience with a Halloween mask equipped.
The warpgate will warp you to any other warpgate within its immediate network.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Could not set the squad recruitment description because you are not the squad leader.
Apply the Loyal Soldier pattern to your vehicle.
Join a squad! You'll receive increased experience when supporting your squadmates.
Explosive Ammunition reduces the weapon's direct damage to 250, and adds 75 splash damage over 1.5 meters.
Increases the power of the Nanite Proximity Repair System by 200%.
This customization adds a decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Get the most popular Combat Medic weapons at a discounted price!
Click to select vehicle to respawn into.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a TR Gold Hood Ornament.
A set of cosmetic armor plates and accents suitable for seasoned Infiltrators.

While deployed, the Prowler generates shield layer at a rate of 93 shield per second, to a maximum of 1000 shield health. Taking damage pauses shield regeneration for 4 seconds, and a fully depleted shield will not begin regenerating until out of combat for 10 seconds.
Allows the Nano-Armor Kit to be used to disarm and deconstruct enemy Tank Mines.
Adds 4 grenades to the default magazine size.
<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey, kid. We only do business with Outfits. Join one and maybe we'll talk.
The barrier dome generator needs to be defended or the attacking empires can hit the courtyard with heavy ordnance
Apply the Hyper camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Attackers have been repelled. Good work.
Increases xp and resource gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 30 minutes. Boost can only be used on this character.
The standard-issue SG-100 has a large magazine size and excellent pellet coverage, making it a staple among operatives in CQB scenarios. NSO use only.
Allows use of the close range 1x HPR sight.
Lock 艾美瑞什 by maintaining 51% territory control
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 10%
The straight-pull bolt allows the sniper to chamber another round while aiming down sights.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Good news, I have been informed that our analysts detected a residual echo from Representative Foster's bio signal. They believe he is still on the continent. Please continue to the first scan location.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies near the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.
An imposing set of horns for a helmet.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.
Roadkills with a Flash or Harasser will restore 40% base turbo energy.
The A-1M allows shooters to get good target acquisition on mid-range enemies.

EMP Grenades create a blast that can go through walls and destroy most enemy deployables. Soldiers directly caught in the blast will also have their personal shields and HUD disabled for a few seconds.
A 10x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
Generates a decaying shield of nanites around the soldier that mitigates 35% damage instead of preventing it. Damage taken does not cause this shield to drain more quickly. Lasts up to 15 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 second.
Detects enemies in a small area around the dart.
Experience cannot be earned while in VR Training.
Illuminate the battlefield with these front-facing Shadesplitter Headlights for your Sunderer. NC only.
The Magrider is the Vanu Sovereignty's main battle tank. It features the greatest agility of any battle tank and is the only tank that can strafe.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Apply the single use Temperate Chaparral camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

Illuminate the battlefield with these front-facing Searchlights for your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this decal.
When activated this provides a temporary burst of speed that can be used to mount an assault or quickly dash to cover.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> While monitoring "reclaimed" vehicles, we discovered that not only was the plating resistant to the harmful effects of Esamir storm, but that interacting with these reclaimed vehicles also had residual effects on equipment being worn by passengers.
This horn demonstrates the technological might of Vanu by playing portion of the technologically advanced Vanu faction theme.
The Flail fires a volley of 4 mortar shells in quick succession, doing moderate damage to all in range. Requires AI module as well as a manually fired targeting dart in order to fire.
The Cortium Turbo Engine grants powerful thrust by converting stored minerals into fuel. The C300 consumes 150 Cortium per second.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 shells.
Adds 50 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the speed at which your shields regenerate to full by 33%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180 rounds.
Kill enemy MAX units as a Heavy Assault.

Unlocks access to Advanced Specialization Program training, resetting your battle rank and allowing you to gain new A.S.P. skills every 25 ranks. </br></br><font color="#bf0000">Battle Rank 100+ required to purchase this item.</font>
The Eclipse easily overshadows its predecessor, the Solstice, as a close-quarters combat king. It comes equipped with an underbarrel plasma shotgun for ambushes and last-ditch scenarios.
Promotional and seasonal weapons which may not be available for immediate acquistion.
The miniaturized Gecko 20mm is a heavy machine gun capable of fending off any assailant.
MAX units are very proficient at killing infantry and vehicles. To equip a MAX you must go to an equipment terminal.

The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 50 meter radius for 45 seconds.
Adds 6 round to the default magazine size.

Special Auraxium-plated plastic explosives capable of incredible damage to both infantry, MAXes, and vehicles.

Use a Warpgate Terminal to transport yourself to Esamir.
Celebrate nine years of war on Auraxis with these new anniversary items!

Unlocks the Lightning Grenade for this character. Lightning Grenades are resupplied using Nanites. When this sticky grenade is thrown during an Electrical Storm, it will create the conditions for a lightning strike at its location.

Has no effect when thrown outside of an Electrical Storm. Takes 6 seconds for a bolt to manifest.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Activate to cause your weapons to passively reload for several seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Expires at the end of the Campaign.</font>

Reduces the rate of decay on your overshield by 80% while stationary, and 40% while moving. Additionally, an active Heavy Shield no longer prevents your personal shield from recharging. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Auto spots enemies who damage or kill you; also auto spots enemies that you damage.
Allows the use of low rocket-assisted jumps with a short cooldown.

The device is still overloaded from the last vehicle you recovered.

The Saron HRB fires a fast and accurate armor damaging particle beam. Accuracy destabilizes for a split second after each shot. VS use only.
The Raycast infrared/nightvision optic highlights infantry targets at close range, allowing for better performance in dimly lit engagements.
Advanced targeting system can lock-on to air and ground vehicles

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> For now our technicians require the power to be redirected to another facility for, so please proceed to the marked circuits and calibrate them to redistribute power as required.
Extended magazine certification for the Vanguard based Mjolnir has been refunded. It has been replaced with a two-rank version.
Restocks one tick of ammunition for all infantry weapons and the weapons of nearby vehicles you own every 60 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
The Nanite Systems G40 Vulcan Cannon is a gatling gun capable of shredding through most targets. The wide cone of fire means this weapon is only effective up close.
Adds an image projection to your flashlight. Decals are weapon-specific. VS use only.
Aim for the head for increased damage.
Search for the Amplified Energy Source
Increases the top speed of the Magrider by 10 KPH.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 rounds.
